question:
You want to create a valid directory structure for your Java EE web application, and you want to
put your web application into a WAR file called MyApp.war. Which two are true about the WAR
file? (Choose two.)

options.A: At deploy time, Java EE containers add a directory called META-INF directly into the MyApp directory.
options.B: At deploy time, Java EE containers add a file called MANIFES
options.C: MF directly into the MyApp directory.
options.D: It can instruct your Java EE container to verify, at deploy time, whether you have properly configured your application’s classes.
options.E: At deploy time, Java EE containers add a directory call META-WAR directly into the MyApp directory.
